ingredients.content: 2 vegetable stock cubes (for 0.5 l each), crumbled
800 g tinned chopped tomatoes (2 x 400 g tins)
1 pinch fine sea salt, or to taste
2 - 3 sprigs fresh coriander, leaves only, for garnishing

preparations.content: Place onions and oil in mixing bowl, chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b> then sauté <b>5 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.
Add ginger, ground coriander, cumin, paprika, pepper, cinnamon, turmeric, chilli powder and nutmeg then cook <b>1 min/100°C/speed 1<b>.
Add water, vegetable stock, lentils and tomatoes then cook <b>15-20 min/100°C//speed 1<b> until lentils are cooked. Season with salt and pepper to taste, garnish with fresh coriander and serve hot.
